curam.util.common.domain

Class AbstractDomainPlugIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.common.plugin.AbstractPlugIn
      • curam.util.common.domain.AbstractDomainPlugIn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomainPlugIn, PlugIn
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractClientDomainPlugIn, AbstractDomainMarshal, AbstractDomainRenderer, curam.util.common.domain.DefaultMutableDomainOptions

    public abstract class AbstractDomainPlugIn
extends AbstractPlugIn
implements DomainPlugIn
    A base class for domain plug-ins that provides simple life-cycle management and supports a shared, thread-local plug-in context.

    • Method Detail

      • getDomain

        public Domain getDomain()

        Gets the domain applicable to this plug-in instance. This is a convenient wrapper for getContainer.

        While a plug-in may be associated with one domain in the domain configuration, it will be inherited by any sub-domains, and one of these sub-domains will be reported to apply to this instance. When a plug-in re-uses another plug-in, then the domain of the first plug-in applies to the second.

        Specified by:
        getDomain in interface DomainPlugIn
        Returns:
        The domain associated with this plug-in.

      • isArabic

        public boolean isArabic()
        Determines whether the locale is Arabic.
        Returns:
        true if the locale is Arabic
